markdownRemark.html:
Search NPM registry

Github

Problem

I want to be able to search the NPM registry with text inputs.

I want to list out the results of the search and see details like name of the package, author and package updated date.

I want to be able to route to a separate page so that the users can view details of the package.

Solution

Stack

  • Frontend: NextJS(React), Material UI
  • Testing: Cypress for automated end-to-end testing
  • DevOps: CircleCi, Heroku, Netlify
  • Misc: Axios

Accomplishments

  • Practised Test Driven Development (TDD) and followed Agile practices
  • Brainstormed user stories, decided on MVP, estimated complexity of each card and our velocity, slotted the user stories into our sprints
  • Pair programmed every day and swapped pairs frequently; rotated and took turns to be BA/QA
  • Trunk based development: everyone worked on master branch instead of creating new feature branches
  • Both frontend and backend deployed to Heroku
